pr_title: Dump all switches to return visible switches

timeline.message:
Dump all switches to return visible switches

switches should be available for dump only after
a handshake

timeline.bodyText: Do we need anywhere "not ready to be used switches"? I mean when we need to set/use "false" for visible argument?
timeline.author: surabujin

replies.bodyText:
underlying fl logic uses it however doesn't expose, I decided to provide the flag as well.
Use case: don't know, might be something in future
replies.author: timofei-durakov
